scenario: In 2024, Grace has an Adjusted Gross Income (AGI) of $154,582.09. Grace makes a charitable contribution of $137,844.80 in cash to a public charity. Under I.R.C. § 170(b)(1)(G)(i)(I), the deduction is limited to 60% of the contribution base.
question: Calculate the allowable charitable deduction for 2024.
answer_explanation: The deduction is limited to 60% of AGI ($92,749.25). Allowable: $92,749.25.
reasoning: Calculated limit and compared to contribution.
